suppress.notes: Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Site Reputation SDK. We can re-evaluate and possible move to Kotlin 1.4.0.

file name: intellij-core-26.4.1.jar (shaded: com.google.protobuf:protobuf-java:2.6.1) Kotlin-analysis-intellij depends on protobuf-java which has CVE-2015-5237. The kotlin-analysis-intellij component is only used during builds to generate reference documentation.
